languages.english-overview:
JoobsBox is the most flexible software for job boards, with a plugins and themes system ready for your needs.
It comes with a plugin system which makes it possible to extend the application easily.
The application offers a powerful administration panel where all the categories, listings, plugins & other variables can be controlled. JoobsBox is multilingual and themeable.
JoobsBox is licensed under BSD License.

ul.li: Approve, edit and delete job postings
